text: Bohodukhiv railway station () is a railway station in Bohodukhiv, Ukraine. ==History== The railway station was built in 1878 in Bogodukhov, which was the administrative centre of Bogodukhov uyezd in Kharkov Governorate of the Russian Empire. During World War II, in 1941 - 1943 the station was damaged as a result of Luftwaffe bombing, fighting, and German occupation. Later the station was completely restored and resumed its work.Богодухов // Большая Советская Энциклопедия. / редколл., гл. ред. С. И. Вавилов. 2-е изд. том 5. М., "Советская энциклопедия", 1991. стр.147 After declaration of independence of Ukraine, the Bogodukhov railway station was renamed into Bohodukhiv railway station. ==References== == Sources == * Архангельский А. С., Архангельский В. А. Железнодорожные станции СССР: Справочник. В 2-х кн. — М. : Транспорт, 1981. Category:Railway stations in Kharkiv Oblast
title: Bohodukhiv railway station
